tweet: Don’t wait to buy $ADA. Buy $ADA and wait!

#Cardano is in the top 6 projects that are written in Haskell.  Facebook, Barclays, and NASA use Haskell to write mission-critical projects. It is great that we have a #blockchain project in #crypto that will be secure and reliable.   https://t.co/lCJnrwfbXO
A new addition to my office. What is imagination?   Did you know that the cryptocurrency $ADA was named after a real person, an inspiring woman Ada Lovelace. #Cardano  https://t.co/ShIgXPU4E0

#Cardano is not just about the price speculation. It is a project that has a mission and strong leader with a few teams that will do everything to achieve it. Being a $ADA #stake-holder means that you are part of the mission. Many people will benefit if the project succeeds.  https://t.co/KubgqedZQN

When governments start to adopt #blockchain and connect the old infrastructure to the #decentralized one the smart contract platforms like #Cardano will be very useful. We are sure that it is going to happen. The question is when. It could be in the next decade.  https://t.co/x9BXe2ldfq

Do I like everyone in #Cardano community? No. Does everyone like me? Heck No! That doesn't matter. We have a common ❤ for $ADA, it's purpose & philosophies.. & how those principles WILL go on to change the world. & yet, it's not our similarities, but our diversity that drives us
